items.name: WebVisualizer
items.title: ParaViewWeb generic visualizer
items.description: Generic web visualization and data processing with the WebVisualizer application that come with ParaView 4.

items.name: OpenChemistry
items.title: Open Chemistry and ParaViewWeb
items.description: This video present the OpenChemistry web portal leveraging the ParaViewWeb framework to handle the 3D rendering of the molecule inside your Web browser.

items.name: Mummy
items.title: ParaViewWeb State based application
items.description: Show how ad-hoc web application can be created based on a ParaView state file

items.name: PWApp
items.title: Main ParaViewWeb application
items.description: Show an advanced ParaViewWeb application based on GWT

items.name: OpenChemistry1
items.title: Open Chemistry ParaViewWeb application
items.description: Show a usage of ParaViewWeb inside the OpenChemistry project

items.name: KiwiViewer connecting to ParaViewWeb
items.title: ParaViewWeb and Mobile devices
items.description: Show how mobile devices could use ParaViewWeb to generate 3D data so it could be rendered locally onto the device.
